duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide care for patients undergoing surgical procedures in the operating room.
Maintain and update patient medical records and administer medications as needed.
Comply with all medical and safety regulations to ensure patient and staff well-being.
Communicate and collaborate with medical and administrative staff to coordinate patient care.
Monitor patient vital signs and report any changes or concerns to the healthcare team.
Respond to medical emergencies and provide immediate care and support as required.

education_certification.credential: Immunization Records for MMR, Varicella, HepB, TDAP, TB/PPD, Flu, and annual physical
